actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit any State from imposing a tax on the income derived by any individual from services in the Federal area within such State if such individual is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or of any other States which imposes a tax on income.

summary.text: Exempts an individual from State income taxes with respect to income received during any period by such individual from transactions occurring, or services performed, in a Federal area located within any State if during such period such individual is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or of any other State which imposes a tax on the income of individuals.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit any State from imposing a tax on the income derived by any individual from services in the Federal area within such State if such individual is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or of any other States which imposes a tax on income.
